environment

Class Statistic<SuperType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • environment.Statistic<SuperType>
  • Type Parameters:
    SuperType - The super type that all the entries of the Map must be subtype of in order to be stored in this Statistic.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Statistic<SuperType>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Represents a statistic about the station. This also encapsulates the behaviour of the retrieving the value of a statistic using get(Class) and collating the value of the total statistic using sum().
    Version:
    27/04/2017
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends SuperType>,java.lang.Double> statMap
      The Map<Class<? extends SuperType>, Double> which stores the Double value of a statistic.

      double sum()
      Sums all the values (Double) of this statistic Map SuperType type groups to yield one total value.

    • Field Detail

      • statMap

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends SuperType>,java.lang.Double> statMap
        The Map<Class<? extends SuperType>, Double> which stores the Double value of a statistic. The Class of a sub-class of SuperType is the key of this Map. The Double value of this Map denotes combined value that type of the key SuperType it is assigned to.
        See Also:
        #sum(Map), #update(Map, Class, double)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Statistic

        public Statistic()
        Constructs a new Statistic.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public final void update(java.lang.Class<? extends SuperType> type,
                         double amount)
        Changes the value (double) of a statistic assigned to a specific SuperType type (Class<? extends SuperType>) by a specified amount in the the parameter statistic map (Map). If the parameter SuperType type and assigned value are not currently stored in the statistic map then they will be added.
        Parameters:
        stat - Map<Class<? extends SuperType>, Double> that denotes some statistic. NOT NULL
        type - Class<? extends SuperType> that denotes the type of SuperType that is assigned to a to the value that is to be updated.
        amount - double that denotes the change in the value.

      • get

        public final double get(java.lang.Class<? extends SuperType> key)
        Retrieves the value of this Statistic by SuperType sub type. If the SuperType sub type type does not have a value stored in the Statistic return zero. If the specified key is NULL return the sum().
        Parameters:
        key - Class<? extends SuperType>
        Returns:
        The double value assigned to that specified key.

      • clone

        public final Statistic<SuperType> clone()
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object

      • sum

        public final double sum()
        Sums all the values (Double) of this statistic Map SuperType type groups to yield one total value.
        Returns:
        The double sum of all the values in this statistic map.
